attributes.action: Hold a new referendum on the UK rejoining the EU
attributes.additional_details: When we were asked to consider leaving the EU, the general public where only given a yes no choice. Campaigners to leave were not honest about the benefits. The benefits have not happened. We are now in a very difficult isolated situation. Would he have left if the truth had been told as opposed to fantasy and lies
attributes.background: To seriously consider, and honestly hold a new debate and referendum, to determine what the people want now, that all of the negative and dishonest revelations surrounding the original campaign to leave have come to light

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625314
